about.title: An Integrated Trading and Construction Entity
about.description:
EZRA Group is a compound company founded in October 1986 in Ethiopia by two brothers. It has since grown into a conglomerate that is involved in the Construction Industry, Transport, General Trading and Supplies.

In June, 2011, the umbrella holding company, Ezra Construction & development Group was registered here in South Sudan and is the regional headquarters. Previously, the company gained experience of more than two decades in Ethiopia and Eritrea having expertise in construction of feeder roads, rigid & flexible pavement roads as well as road bridges.
about.box: We're trusted by more than 70 clients globally.
